home.title: AWS Cloud Solutions Journey
home.des: Cloud Solutions Journey Portal lists all courses created by Solutions Architect teams at Amazon Web Services ( AWS ). Each course provides theory lessons with interactive quizzes to test your knowledge as you complete each module. You can see the available course before you sign in.

highlight.title: Continuous update courses
highlight.desc: New courses and content added and updated all the time.

highlight.title: Interactive quiz
highlight.desc: Test your knowledge with interactive quiz after theory lessons.

highlight.title: Certification of completion
highlight.desc: Receive a certification once complete a course.
